Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Ford Model T Van
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
Produced from 1908 to 1927, the Ford Model T is one of the most iconic cars in automotive history. It was the first automobile mass-produced on moving assembly lines, making it affordable and accessible to a wide audience. Powered by a 2.9-liter, four-cylinder engine, the Model T revolutionized transportation and became a symbol of early 20th-century innovation.

Consumes a lot of fuel, and is best used for short to medium distances.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
